segments.text: This broth is wonderful . What's in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lamb and beef . It will get even tastier when we add the veggies !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! Watch out ! You're using the same spoon for both broths !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're getting that hot stuff in my mild broth !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll be OK . It's just a little bit ...
segments.speaker: S2
